item.title: Flight Compartment and Instrument Lighting System – Night Operations

remarks.para: Individual lights may be inoperative for night operations provided remaining lights are:

numlitem.para: Sufficient to clearly illuminate all required instruments, controls, and other devices for which it is provided,
Positioned so direct rays are shielded from flight crewmembers' eyes, and
Lighting configuration and intensity is acceptable to the flight crew.

note.para: The Terrain DISPLAY and SYSTEM placards and switches must be illuminated during night flights.

placard.para: Placard Flight Compartment and Instrument Lighting panel denoting specific light "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
